DataSource.query:
SELECT RPRCTR, RACCT, HSL, CPUDT, CPUTM, BUDAT, KOSTL
FROM tm1satis2.dbo.TM1_GLPCA_D
WHERE (
(BUDAT >= CONVERT(DATE,'?pBaslangicTarihi?')  AND BUDAT<=CONVERT(DATE,'?pBitisTarihi?') AND CPUDT< CONVERT(DATE,'?pDonemBitisTarihi?') ) 
OR            
(BUDAT >= CONVERT(DATE,'?pBaslangicTarihi?')  AND BUDAT <= CONVERT(DATE,'?pBitisTarihi?') AND CPUDT= CONVERT(DATE,'?pDonemBitisTarihi?') AND CONVERT(INT,CPUTM) <=CONVERT(INT,'?pKapanisSaati?'))
OR
(BUDAT <  CONVERT(DATE,'?pBaslangicTarihi?') AND  CPUDT= CONVERT(DATE,'?pDonemBitisTarihi?') AND CONVERT(INT,CPUTM) <= CONVERT(INT,'?pKapanisSaati?'))
OR
(CPUDT >CONVERT(DATE,'?pOncekiDonemKapanis?') AND CPUDT < CONVERT(DATE,'?pDonemBitisTarihi?') AND BUDAT < CONVERT(DATE,'?pBaslangicTarihi?' )) 
OR
(CPUDT = CONVERT(DATE,'?pOncekiDonemKapanis?')  AND CONVERT(INT,CPUTM) > CONVERT(INT,'?pOncekiDonemKapanisSaat?') AND BUDAT <CONVERT(DATE,'?pBaslangicTarihi?') )) 
AND (racct like '6%' or racct like '8%')

UNION ALL

SELECT RPRCTR, RACCT, HSL, CPUDT, CPUTM, BUDAT, KOSTL
FROM tm1satis2.dbo.TM1_GLPCA_K
WHERE (
(BUDAT >= CONVERT(DATE,'?pBaslangicTarihi?')  AND BUDAT<=CONVERT(DATE,'?pBitisTarihi?') AND CPUDT< CONVERT(DATE,'?pDonemBitisTarihi?') ) 
OR            
(BUDAT >= CONVERT(DATE,'?pBaslangicTarihi?')  AND BUDAT <= CONVERT(DATE,'?pBitisTarihi?') AND CPUDT= CONVERT(DATE,'?pDonemBitisTarihi?') AND CONVERT(INT,CPUTM) <=CONVERT(INT,'?pKapanisSaati?'))
OR
(BUDAT <  CONVERT(DATE,'?pBaslangicTarihi?') AND  CPUDT= CONVERT(DATE,'?pDonemBitisTarihi?') AND CONVERT(INT,CPUTM) <= CONVERT(INT,'?pKapanisSaati?'))
OR
(CPUDT >CONVERT(DATE,'?pOncekiDonemKapanis?') AND CPUDT < CONVERT(DATE,'?pDonemBitisTarihi?') AND BUDAT < CONVERT(DATE,'?pBaslangicTarihi?' )) 
OR
(CPUDT = CONVERT(DATE,'?pOncekiDonemKapanis?')  AND CONVERT(INT,CPUTM) > CONVERT(INT,'?pOncekiDonemKapanisSaat?') AND BUDAT <CONVERT(DATE,'?pBaslangicTarihi?') )) 
AND (racct like '6%' or racct like '8%')
